AI INTEGRATION.
FAST-TRACKED.

Fast-track AI transformation through high-quality, customizable products built using NLP, OCR and Document Processing techniques!

Explore

Inscripta is an AI technology & consulting company that helps businesses fast-track integration of AI capabilities. Our products, built using state-of-the-art NLP, OCR and Document Processing techniques, can be customized quickly for a variety of business domains. We have many years of experience with pioneering AI companies, ensuring high-quality, pragmatic and business-ready solutions. Our ability to handle real-world, noisy, heterogeneous data allows you to focus on your business problem, instead of getting bogged down in the intricacies of AI implementations.
